com.ibm.mqlight.api

Class SendOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.mqlight.api.SendOptions

  • public class SendOptions
extends Object
    A set of options that can be used to configure the behaviour of the NonBlockingClient NonBlockingClient.send(String, java.nio.ByteBuffer, Map, SendOptions, CompletionListener, Object) and NonBlockingClient.send(String, String, Map, SendOptions, CompletionListener, Object) methods. For example: 
     SendOptions opts = SendOptions.builder().setQos(QOS.AT_LEAST_ONCE).setTtl(5000).build();
 client.send("/tadpoles", "Hello baby frogs!", opts, listener, null);
